SignUpByMobile.title: tsarisela
SignUpByMobile.phoneNumberPlaceholder: Hi kombela u nghenisa nomboro ya wena ya riqingho ra le mavokweni .
SignUpByMobile.verificationCodePlaceholder: Hi kombela u nghenisa khodi ya ku tiyisisa .

errors.phoneRequired: Hi kombela u nghenisa nomboro ya wena ya riqingho ra le mavokweni .
errors.phoneInvalid: Fomati ya nomboro ya riqingho ra le mavokweni a yi lulamanga .
errors.codeRequired: Hi kombela u nghenisa khodi ya ku tiyisisa .
errors.codeInvalid: Xivumbeko xa khodi ya ku tiyisisa a xi lulamanga .
errors.verificationFailed: Ku kumiwa ka khodi ya ku tiyisisa swi tsandzekile .

success.verificationCodeSent: Khodi ya ku tiyisisa yi rhumeriwile .
success.registerSuccess: Yi tsarisiwile hi ndlela leyi humelelaka .
